page.title: 11Farming in Lezant Area
page.content: {January:}Cows inside for winter,farmer does not go far because of wet land. {February:}Cows return to the field {March:}The land is rolled some seeds are planted,March is a busy time. {April:}End of April barley 10 cm tall.Top dressing spread;helps weeds grow as well,so weed killer sprayed. {May:}First cut silage. {June:}Still doing silage,Royal Cornwall Show held.Hay cut. {July:}Crops ripen,second silage. {August:}Harvest,grain gathered at right time. {September:}Fields ploughed,stubble burnt. {October:}Potatoes harvested. {November:}Grass not nutritious,so cows brought inside. {December:}Cows in shed,fed with silage.
